TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Label extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 表示控件的文本标签，并提供访问密钥支持。

span.span: Represents the text label for a control and provides support for access keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供访问密钥 (也称为助记键) 的功能和视觉支持。This class provides both functional and visual support for access keys (also known as mnemonics). 它经常用于启用对等控件的快速键盘访问。It is frequently used to enable quick keyboard access to controls such as a . 若要将分配到, 请将属性设置为当用户按下访问键时应获得焦点的控件。To assign a to a , set the property to the control that should get focus when the user presses the access key. 设置目标还会导致[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]将标签文本用作目标控件的名称。Setting the target also causes [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] to use the text of the label as the name of the targeted control. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[辅助功能](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/index.md)。For more information, see [Accessibility](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/index.md). 若要设置访问密钥, 请在应为访问键的字符前添加一个下划线。To set the access key, add an underscore before the character that should be the access key. 如果内容有多个下划线字符, 则只会将第一个下划线字符转换为访问密钥;其他下划线显示为普通文本。If your content has multiple underscore characters, only the first one is converted into an access key; the other underscores appear as normal text. 如果要转换为访问键的下划线不是第一个下划线, 请在要转换的下划线前面使用两个连续的下划线。If the underscore that you want converted to the access key is not the first underscore, use two consecutive underscores for any underscores that precede the one that you want to convert. 例如, 以下代码包含一个访问键, 并显示为 _Hello**W**orld:For example, the following code contains an access key and displays as _Hello**W**orld: ``` ``` 由于 H 前面的下划线为 double, 因此 W key 注册为访问键。Because the underscore that precedes H is a double, the W key registers as the access key. 标签不可设定焦点, 并且不是制表位。A label is not focusable, and it is not a tab stop. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For details, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 是,这意味着它可以包含任何类型的单个对象(例如字符串、图像或面板)。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. ## 自定义标签控件Customizing the Label Control 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置, 请使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 , 为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息, 请参阅[通过创建 system.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态, 请参阅[标签样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/label-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Label Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/label-styles-and-templates.md). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性, 则当控件出现在应用程序中时, 属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建使用绑定设置目标的。The following example shows how to create a that uses a binding to set the target. [!code-xaml[LabelSnippet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LabelSnippet/CS/Pane1.xaml#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建一个具有访问键且支持文本换行的。The following example shows how to create a that has an access key and supports text wrapping. [!code-xaml[LabelSnippet#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LabelSnippet/CS/Pane1.xaml#4)]

summary.span: 作为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构的一部分，为此控件提供相应的 实现。

span.span: Provides an appropriate implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

returns.span: 特定于类型的 实现。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::UIElement ^ Target { System::Windows::UIElement ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::UIElement ^ value); };
member this.Target : System.Windows.UIElement with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户按下标签的访问键时获得焦点的元素。

span.span: Gets or sets the element that receives focus when the user presses the label's access key.

value.span: 当用户按下访问键时获得焦点的 。

span.span: The that receives focus when the user presses the access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过提供访问键并设置此属性, 可以为不支持访问键的元素提供键盘快捷方式。You can provide keyboard shortcuts to elements that don't support access keys by giving a an access key and setting this property. 向标签分配一个访问键, 方法是在用作访问键的字符的紧前面放置一个下划线。Assign an access key to a label by placing an underscore immediately before the character that acts as the access key. 可以在属性中指定访问密钥, 也可以通过将设置为对象来指定访问密钥。An access key can be specified in the property or by setting to an object. 不能使用此属性来定义。You cannot use this property to define a . 例如, 下面的编译但不起作用: ``。For example, the following compiles but is not functional: ``. 此属性提供对已在应用程序中定义的元素的引用。This property provides a reference to an element that is already defined in your application. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values `nameOfExistingElement` 按下访问键时获得焦点的的名称。The name of that receives focus when the access key is pressed. ## Examples 以下示例演示如何设置 的 属性。The following example shows how to set the property of a . [!code-xaml[LabelSnippet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LabelSnippet/CS/Pane1.xaml#1)]
